explains: v. 驱逐，赶出；喷射，排出；（飞行员从即将坠毁的飞机中）弹出；（磁带或光盘）弹出

sentences.en: Officials used guard dogs to eject the protesters.
sentences.cn: 官员们用护卫犬驱走抗议者。

sentences.en: You can now safely eject the CD.
sentences.cn: 您现在可以安全地弹出CD。

sentences.en: I said to myself, I can't eject yet.
sentences.cn: 我只有告诉自己，不能，还不能弹射。
